description:
Create Your Own Low Polygon Jazzy Background

I have made this short course to show you how in a playful way you can create sleek Low Poly Background designs. You don't need any software, just download the free app Triangulator - credits: somestuff russia (link provided inside the course) and 12 base bitmap images provided by me in the Resources Lecture.


Joining for the course also includes

  • Access to the discussion forums
  • Access to all future lectures that will be added to this course (that may be a result of questions from the discussions forums) or new techniques related to the subject
  • Discount coupons for other new courses that I launch!


Have Fun!

Kasia Zmokla - Digital Art Classes
title: Create Your Own Low Polygon Jazzy Background
